text: The WHO Steering Group was composed of Nathalie Broutet, Shona Dalal, Linda Eckert (who also supported the GDG, the workgroups, and the WHO Secretariat), Morkor Newman and Ajay Rangaraj.This group was assisted by Myriam Cortes and Jane Werunga-Ndanareh.
